abstract: The mobile devices of late 2011 might physically resemble the current smartphones, but they will be much more computer than phone.
snippet: The mobile devices of late 2011 might physically resemble the current smartphones, but they will be much more computer than phone.
lead_paragraph: By now we can probably all agree that the iPhone is the Model T, the Sputnik, the Lawrence Taylor of the mobile technology realm. We are still waiting for the offenses to adapt, the competition to catch up.

headline.main: What Your Phone Might Do for You Two Years From Now
headline.print_headline: What Your Phone Might Do for You Two Years From Now
